_xResult.title: Golden Brocade Shift Dress
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made shift dress with sleeveless cut
_xResult.longdesc:
The inspiration for this dress started from the fabric. If the night sky could be painted on a dress, we imagine it would turn out to look just like this made to measure masterpiece. This piece is the perfect cocktail dress and will flatter all silhouettes. Wear for holiday parties, evening events or wherever you want to feel glamorous.

You need a dress made custom to your measurements. You'll love the feeling of knowing it's made just for you and fits you perfectly!
